Storages

　The Storages class is a class with methods and properties related to the storage system of Kirikiri. Objects cannot be created from this class.

メンバ

コンストラクタ
なし
メソッド
addAutoPath ( Add to automatic search path )
chopStorageExt ( Truncation of storage name extension )
extractStorageExt ( Extract storage name extension )
extractStorageName ( Extract storage name )
extractStoragePath ( Extract path of storage name )
getFullPath ( Get the complete unified storage name )
getLocalName ( Get local file name )
getPlacedPath ( Search for storage )
isExistentStorage ( Checking the existence of storage )
removeAutoPath ( Delete automatic search path )
searchCD ( Search CD )
selectFile ( Show file selection dialog box )
プロパティ
なし
イベント
なし
